alert.note: Alert for Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 8:04PM EST until February 26 at 7:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Conewango Creek At Russell affecting Warren County. For the Conewango Creek...including Russell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Conewango Creek At Russell. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Both banks begin to overflow, affecting low lying areas. At 9.0 feet, A number of homes on the right, or west bank are affected by high water. At 10.0 feet, A number of homes on the right, or west bank are affected. The roadway on the left bank is also affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The creek is expected to remain near minor flood stage through early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
